scripts.say: Commander, I want to express my gratitude for the determination and dedication you've shown to me thus far.
Thinking back, I've realized that, all along, you were the person who offered me hope and gave meaning to my life.
I'm growing powerful to the point where I, too, may live up to your expectations.
To summarize my thoughts... I will never forget all that you've done for me. I also wish to say... thank you.
The war still hasn't ended, though. Are you willing to accompany me once more into the unknown, Commander?
